lead_paragraph: Nearly 2 ½ months after the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, hundreds of workers still haven't been paid and are planning to sue the local organizing committee to get their money.

headline.print_headline: Workers Threaten to Sue Rio Olympics Over Late Payments
headline.main: Workers Threaten to Sue Rio Olympics Over Late Payments

snippet: Nearly 2 ½ months after the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, hundreds of workers still haven't been paid and are planning to sue the local organizing committee to get their money....
